q: Microsystems, has by far the most enterprise experience in the triumvirate that runs Google, which also includes co-founder Sergey Brin .`` Eric Schmidt clearly had passion for enterprise software,'' says Gartner analyst Whit Andrews. He cared about enterprise software. He worked at a lot of companies that sold enterprise software and bunch of enterprise products. That history is not in place with Larry Page . Google officials consider Google Apps a strategic business and,`` they are highly ethical so they would not just pull the plug,'' adds Gartner analyst Tom Austin . But it remains to be seen

- crisis.html"> New York- The UN Security Council on Friday called for a peaceful and prompt href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/resolution.html"> resolution of the political stalemate in Ivory Coast, where strongman Laurent Gbagbo is still clinging to power. Council members underscore their strong desire that the crisis be resolved peacefully, rapidly and on conditions that respect the will of the href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/Ivory-Coast.html"> Ivory Coast people, said Brazil Ambassador Maria Luiza Ribeiro Viotti , the council president.Maria Luiza Ribeiro Viotti reiterated previous calls by the 15-nation council for Ivory Coast to resolve the conflict over November's presidential elections that were claimed by Gbagbo and his internationally- recognized rival Alassane Ouattara .

Sample`` We will no doubt see attempts to pass these bills in the Senate,'' Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-NY and Sen. Richard Blumenthal D-CT said in a letter to colleagues on Wednesday. We must work together to stop these bills in their tracks, as they represent an unprecedented effort to restrict women's access to reproductive health care and to their trusted health care providers, the Senators said. The African Union last week set up the five-member panel to deliver binding resolutions within a month to Gbagbo and Alassane Ouattara , the internationally recognised winner of the disputed November 28 elections. staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals.
